# Cancelled Tender Notice

## Summary

The Department of National Defence has cancelled the tender notice for the Procurement of Liferafts Inflatable (N4220F) under solicitation number *W8485-226535/C*.

## Tender Details

*   Tender Closing Date: 2022-10-27T15:00:00
*   Amendment Date: 2022-10-27
*   Tender Status: Cancelled
*   Government Contracting Authority: Department of National Defence
*   Procurement Category: *Goods and Services*
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
*   Regions of Opportunity: *World*
*   Regions of Delivery: *Canada*

## Supplier Contact Information

*   Contact Name: Lebel, Danny
*   Contact Email: [dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca)
